flawed_nl_solution:
Each small piece is 6 inches because 72 / 12 = <<72/12=6>>6.
Each piece is then 1 inches long after the knots are tied because 6-1=<<6-1=1>>1
The three pieces tied together are now 3 inches long because 1 x 3 = <<1*3=3>>3
